Name: Pecan
Description: A savory nut with a striped seed. Do you own a nutcracker?

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una nuez sabrosa con una semilla rayada. ¿Eres dueño de un cascanueces?
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 줄무늬 씨앗을 가진 고소한 견과류. 호두까기를 가지고 있나요?
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine wohlschmeckende Nuss. Besitzt du einen Nussknacker?
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une noix savoureuse dont la graine a des rainures. Avez-vous un casse-noix ?
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Egy ízletes dióféle, melynek magja csíkos. Van esetleg otthon egy diótörőd?
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 縦じま模様の種のおいしいナッツ。くるみ割り人形は持ってる？
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma noz saborosa com uma semente listrada. Você tem um quebra-nozes?
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Пикантный орех с полосатым семенем. У вас есть щелкунчик?
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Çizgili bir tohumu olan tuzlu bir yemiş. Yemiş kıracağın var mı?
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一种种子带条纹的美味坚果。你有核桃夹吗？
